name: Flick & Flats
description:
Welcome to Flick & Flats, a hypercasual endless arcade game where you flick something off the flat.

0.Flick the balls to eliminate the cubes.

1.Use Mousebutton L to flick the ball in the direction of the arrow

   Hold it to adjust flick force, release to shoot

2.Mousebutton R to change the ball you are gonna flick

3.Elimination will revive the ball you used

4.You can also press Spacebar to randomly sacrifice 2 active balls for 1 score

5.You get to keep all the remained ball when going to next level

Hope you enjoy
